sentence.Network_en: Isabelle placed a wine cup on the table within his reach.
sentence.Network_cn: 伊莎贝尔把酒杯放在桌上他伸手可及的地方。

sentence.Network_en: He placed the ball and tried a couple of feints.
sentence.Network_cn: 他把球放好，试着虚打了几下。

sentence.Network_en: We had kept its presence hidden with a strategically placed chair.
sentence.Network_cn: 我们用一张摆放得很巧妙的椅子将它隐藏了起来。

The books will be placed in the deposit box ., 书将放在保管箱里.

entry.tran: （与副词连用构成形容词）表示“具有…能力（做）的”
entry.def: -placed combines with adverbs to form adjectives which describe how well or badly someone is able to do a particular task.

example.ex: A member of the Royal Commission on Criminal Justice, Miss Rafferty is well-placed to comment...
example.tran: 作为刑事司法皇家专门调查委员会的成员，拉弗蒂小姐发表评论恰如其分。

example.ex: I imagine he thought you were better-placed than most to know the truth...
example.tran: 我想他认为你所处的位置使你比大多数人都更了解真相。

entry.tran: （与副词连用构成形容词）表示“位置…的”
entry.def: -placed combines with adverbs to form adjectives which indicate how good or bad the position of a building or area is considered to be.

example.ex: The hotel is wonderfully placed only a minute's walk from the city centre...
example.tran: 这家宾馆的位置极佳，离市中心步行只需1分钟。

example.ex: Chicago is perfectly-placed for exploring the US by rail...
example.tran: 芝加哥所处的位置是乘火车了解美国的最佳之处。

means.word_mean: 1. situated in a particular spot or position;
2. put in position in relation to other things;

auth_sentence.content: I placed one swatch in front of each eye.
auth_sentence.res_content: I placed one swatch in front of each eye.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: I placed one swatch in front of each eye.

auth_sentence.content: He stopped and placed a call from his desk.

auth_sentence.res_content_con: He stopped and placed a call from his desk.

auth_sentence.content: Then he was handcuffed and placed in a van.
auth_sentence.res_content: Then he was handcuffed and placed in a van.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Then he was handcuffed and placed in a van.

Sentence.sentence: Placed in an insulated (隔绝的) case and surrounded by a quarter-inch-thick panels of stainless steel, the boxes can withstand massive force and temperatures up to 2,000℉.

They are also well placed to bring something extra to the teaching side of an academic role that will help students get a job when they graduate, says Lee, perhaps experience in manufacturing practice or product development.
The rigorous requirements placed on the writing of poetry stimulate the poet's creativity.
Obstacles deliberately placed in the creation of music contribute to its success
For the same reason, he placed the chairs close to each other and raised the temperature to a slightly uncomfortable level.
